template.description:
Generate Vehicle Location Simulator
Extract Key Attributes From FlowFiles
Filter Key Attribute Values To JSON File
Enrich Data By Adding Neighborhoods Nearby Transit Vehicles
template.name: tutorial-2-enrich-flow-via-places-api

labels.label: Filter Key Attribute Values To JSON File
Extract Key Attributes From XML FlowFiles

entry.value: Vehicle_ID, Direction_of_Travel, Latitude, Longitude, Vehicle_Speed, Last_Time

config.comments: Makes a filtering decision on the attributes. Each time that all the conditions are true, those attributes are pushed to the attributesToJSON processor.

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

value.name: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.key: Max Length To Put In Attribute

entry.value: Vehicle_ID, city, Latitude, Longitude, neighborhoods_nearby, Last_Time

config.comments: Split the XML into multiple FlowFiles, each comprised of children (vehicle tag) of the parent element (body tag). Note: you can see these tags in the XML feed. A link is provided in the comments section of GetHTTP.
